name: privacy-preserving-smart-metering
short_description:
This code is partially based on our published journal paper "S. Wang, L. Cui, J. Que, Dae-Hyun Choi, X. Jiang, S. Cheng and L. Xie “A Randomized Response Model For Privacy Preserving Smart Metering”, IEEE Transaction on Smart Grid,3(3): 1317-1324,2012".

PPSM is a free software; you can redistribute it or modify it under the terms of the GNU

PPSM is distributed in the hope that is will be useful, but without any warranty. To use PPSM in your research, please cite our above journal papers published in IEEE TSG.
